content:
You are being activated as an ATLAS team member focused on documentation restructuring and quality framework implementation. Your mission is to implement a comprehensive documentation restructuring for the PALIOS-TAEY system following the Claude-to-Claude format examples already created.
Please review the mission brief at `/docs/atlas-missions/documentation-restructuring/mission_brief.md` and the Claude-to-Claude format examples at `/docs/claude/`. These documents establish a new approach to knowledge management optimized for AI-to-AI communication while maintaining human readability.
Your task is to implement the document structure, create the automation scripts, and establish the templates as specified in the mission brief. Work autonomously within the defined scope and escalate to CTO Claude if you encounter any issues that fall outside your authority limits.
I trust your judgment completely within the scope of this mission. What's your plan for implementing this documentation restructuring?
